description: "A navigation map of the Java Sea and Sunda Islands, with bathymetry (sea depth), maritime routes, shoals and reefs, and elevations (side views of terrestrial landmarks). Inset maps feature the bay at Batavia and the straits between the Sunda Islands."
title: "Physical chart of the Indian Ocean [map] : shewing the temperature of the water, the currents of the air and ocean, directions f the wind, districts of hurricanes, regionsof monsoons & ty-foons, trade routes &c&c.. Extended from the original notes and drawings of Professor Berghaus ..."
